title: Send Patient Satisfaction Survey
description: Twenty-four hours after a patient's appointment, the system automatically sends them a satisfaction survey.

tasks.description: A system process identifies all completed appointments from the previous day.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a list of patients to survey.

tasks.description: For each patient, the system sends a link to a satisfaction survey via email or text.
tasks.expected_outcome: The survey is successfully delivered to the patients.

tasks.description: The patient's responses are collected and aggregated into a performance dashboard.
tasks.expected_outcome: The practice is able to collect feedback to improve the patient experience.
